response:
" persoanlichen daten schützen - mehr als nur ein hashtag. wirklichkeit: datensammeljäger überall 🕵️‍♂️ #datenschutz"

in this post, i criticize the现状 of data privacy by pointing out that protecting personal information is more than just a trending topic or hashtag. the mention of "datensammeljäger überall" (data collecting hunters everywhere) serves to emphasize the real threat to individual privacy in our digital age.
